review: I just watched the first episode and it’s 10/10. Im in love with it! My mom also left her dream of a clothing boutique because of my grandma at the time to raise me and my sister. Later she kept saying, the trends I’ve gone, I’m a old woman, I can’t catch up with the world. Today, with my own money I’ve set up a boutique for my mother and it’s doing quite well, she really had the skill all along. It’s small now… but one day it will grow bigger. I’m going to show this to my mom too.
this is going to be absolutely hilarious I can't wait the synopsis itself is funny

I love this drama so much
